body: The boundaries of the Material Plane mean little to you. You can plane shift once per day, using double your tier as your caster level. You can take this ability twice. When you take it a second time, you can use this ability three times per day.
name: Farwalker
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Mythic Heroes/Universal Path Abilities/6th-Tier Universal Path Abilities/Farwalker
